article_title: Larkin Community Hospital buys Palm Springs General in Hialeah
article_text:
Purchase adds to Larkin’s expansion over five years

Larkin chairman says more physicians will be trained

State healthcare regulators have yet to issue license

article_metadata.news-keywords: Larkin Community Hospital, Palm Springs General Hospital, Miami, Florida, hospitals, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, healthcare
article_metadata.description: Looking to expand its reach in South Florida and to position itself for the future of healthcare reform, Larkin Community Hospital in South Miami announced this week the purchase of Palm Springs General Hospital in Hialeah for about $40 million.
article_metadata.title: Larkin Community Hospital buys Palm Springs General in Hialeah | Miami Herald
